itsfood.name: itsfood
itsfood.about: "Hi! I'm itsfood. Currently, I play random games I find laying around in my library. I love making videos, and I upload them all to YouTube! I used to stream on Twitch, but have lost the time needed currently to continue that. I will start streaming again later in 2022! Check it out sometime, you just might enjoy! Subscribe :) (You can always unsub if you end up not enjoying it). Affiliate on 10/26/20!!"

alien.name: ALIENisLIVE
alien.about: "Hey y'all, my name's Alien! I enjoy playing indie horror games and other weird, non-mainstream games. I also rap, voice act, stream, video edit, and host my own podcast called "The Editors' Lounge". People know me for my out of pocket humor, cracked gaming moments, and random nonsensical bulls**t I say during stream. I’m also an expert on women, so be sure to ask me for advice, and I will teach you the ways of understanding the wonders of the female mind. Anyways, I’m gonna go back to saying random nonsensical bulls**t on social media. Catch ya later!"

nic.name: TwoDyslexic
nic.about: Casual Streamer, Funny Moments Man and Musician
